urn_samm_io.catenax.shared.uuid_2.0.0_Uu.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the UUID is composed of five groups of characters separated by hyphens, in the form 8-4-4-4-12 for a total of 36 characters (32 hexadecimal characters and 4 hyphens), optionally prefixed by "urn:uuid:" to make it an IRI.

urn_samm_org.eclipse.esmf.samm_character.description: Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.

urn_samm_io.catenax.early_warning_notifi.description: A status infomration dÂ´selected from a predefined set of possible states.
Describes the severity of a quality issue.

catenaXId.description: A unique identifier for a part or a vehicle. The identifier relates to a Catena-X digital twin

urn_samm_io.catenax.early_warning_notifi.description: Characteristic for the UIDs defining the affected items
Characteristic for the values in the value list
Population filter for the early warning data

aspectProperty.description: A property from the aspect model referenced by "aspectModel"

aspectModel.description: A reference to an aspect model standardized by Catena-X for the quality use case

rangeFrom.description: Start value of a value range for an aspect property

rangeTo.description: End value of a value range for an aspect property

valueList.description: A list of values for the aspect property

urn_samm_io.catenax.early_warning_notifi.description: Characteristic for a List of Population Filters

notificationId.description: A unique ID for the EW notification

relatedQualityTaskID.description: An ID to reference an existing early warning project and its data

information.description: Some text describing the detected anomaly in the data

status.description: A status information about the current status of the quality process triggered by this notification.

severity.description: A flag indicating the severity of the quality issue

listOfAffectedItems.description: List of unique identifiers to explicitly specify parts or vehicles exhibiting the issue described in the property "Information"

earlyWarningAttachmentLink.description: This property provides a reference to an EDC asset that will contain a zip file organized according to the specification CX-0092 and the model defined in io.catenax.quality_task_attachment:1.0.0. The zip file will contain additional data describing the early warning case.
